Sieve.CaseSensitive: boolean: should property names be case-sensitive? Defaults to false
Sieve.DefaultPageSize: int number: optional number to fallback to when no page argument is given. Set <=0 to disable paging if no pageSize is specified (default).
Sieve.MaxPageSize: int number: maximum allowed page size. Set <=0 to make infinite (default)
Sieve.ThrowExceptions: boolean: should Sieve throw exceptions instead of silently failing? Defaults to false
Sieve.IgnoreNullsOnNotEqual: boolean: ignore null values when filtering using is not equal operator? Defaults to true
Sieve.DisableNullableTypeExpressionForSorting: boolean: disable the creation of nullable type expression for sorting. Some databases do not handle it (yet). Defaults to false
